channel.title: Tips on making a good server [easyest way]
channel.description: My friend who has never made his own server before wants to. He needs tips on making one but he needs them in the simplest form. He wants to get into server development but i dont now how to explain it to him easy. Can any one help me with so ways to explain it to him so he could try to make one????
